text: Charles Island is an Arctic island in the Qikiqtaaluk Region, Nunavut, Canada. It is located within Hudson Strait, an arm of Hudson Bay. Charles Bay is on the north side of Charles Island. Cap de Nouvelle-France, on the Ungava Peninsula of Quebec, is directly southeast of the island. ==References== * Sea islands: Atlas of Canada; Natural Resources Canada Category:Islands of the Canadian Arctic Archipelago Category:Islands of Qikiqtaaluk Region Category:Islands of Hudson Strait Category:Uninhabited islands of Qikiqtaaluk Region
title: Charles Island (Nunavut)
